Package ch.ledcom.tomcat.interceptors

Interceptors for the tomcat-jdbc data source.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Metrics
    Reports metrics to a Statsd server.
    ProxyFactory
    Creates Proxys to Statements objects.
    StatementInvocationHandler
    InvocationHandler specialized in reporting metrics around Statement operations.
    StatsdInterceptor
    JdbcInterceptor reporting timing of certain method calls to a Statsd server.

Package ch.ledcom.tomcat.interceptors Description

Interceptors for the tomcat-jdbc data source. See http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-7.0-doc/jdbc-pool.html#JDBC_interceptors for details.
